name: Aaron Finch
comment: You may want a-lot of power but you wont need it. And it burbles when you shift at the right moment. Has a-lot of space and the sleek look makes everything look 10 times better.

name: Marcus Harris
comment: You can gap people easily if you race and it keeps up with a M850 at first. Downside is its not the best for really long road trips for the driver.

name: Travis Head
comment: I always thought the X6 design is unique, sporty and more aggressive (compared to the traditional boxy SUVs like the X5).

name: Usman Khawaja
comment: This X6, however, is for my daily commute and I must say it is absolutely FUN to drive.

name: Labuschagne
comment: The 335 hp makes my drive from home to work (and vice versa) exciting (often times I find myself wanting to drive longer than the usual route! LoL).

name: Steve Smith
comment: The trunk cargo space is decent for my family. Without folding the second row seats, we were able to fit 2 large luggage and 3 carry-on rollies for a long weekend getaway.

name: Ashton Turner
comment: 21/26 mpg is also a plus (my older 2016 GLE only gives me 18/23). I'm a happy camper!

name: David Warner
comment: High quality finishes, incredible and intuitive interface, tight build, sports car handling with SUV ride height. 5L v8 turbo has power to spare and then some. Donâ€™t even need Sport mode but wow!

name: Dan Christian
comment: Absolutely love it all around. gorgeous and carries a punch. More than enough room for what I need. Glad I did not opt for the X5.

name: Cameron Green
comment: It, X6 40i is powered by a 335-hp turbocharged 3.0-liter inline-six that features a 48-volt hybrid system and pairs with an eight-speed automatic transmission and all-wheel drive.

name: Mitchell Marsh
comment: The M50i has the same transmission and all-wheel drive, too, but its twin-turbo 4.4-liter V-8 is significantly more powerful.

name: Glenn Maxwell
comment: Thanks to its design, it catches a lot of attention from people on the road and on the sidewalks (let's face it, there's not too many of these coupe-design SUVs/SAVs out there - that including similar designed cars from MB, Porsche, Audi and Jaguar).
